name: Kodachrome
description:
Kodachrome is a game concept about taking photos at the right time.

Scrub through the footage to find the needed shots and take the photo!

You can view and save your photos by going to the Temp Pics folder in the game's files.

Credits:
Everything - John Wanamaker
